questions.ex3Str: 래킹(racking)은 선체가 가로방향에서 파랑을 받거나 횡요를 하면 선박의 좌·우현 흘수가 달라져서 발생하는 변형을 말한다.
questions.ex4Str: 호깅(hogging)은 선박의 길이와 같은 파장에서 파저가 선체길이의 중앙에 오면 선수·미에서는 부력이 작용하고 선체의 중앙에서는 중력을 받는 상태를 말한다.

questions.questionsStr: The sewage treatment plant comprises three compartments. The incoming sewage enters the ( A ) compartment, where it is supplied with air and is digested and broken down by the activated sludge. The sewage, after being fully purified in the ( B ) compartment, flows into the ( C ) compartment, where the activated sludge settles out and the pure clean water separated from the activated sludge is sterilized in the ( D )compartment and then is discharged overboard.

Low pressure evaporators are sufficiently reliable to provide, during continuous and unattended operation, the water needed for the engine room and domestic consumption. An advantage of low pressure evaporators is that they ( ) otherwise wasted heat from diesel engine jacket cooling water to be put to good use.

Dear Sir: Upon opening up the boiler today, June 10, 2022, I found one of the stays at the back of the combustion chamber in the furnace of boiler ( ). Since there is no spare stays on board and a machine shop to make one, I propose fitting a thimble stay, as in the enclosed sketch. The spare stay should carry to the nearest port, Ulsan, for enabling us to pick it up. I believe this will meet with your approval. Yours truly

Under the Maritime Labour Convention, 2006, as amended, for the purposes of this Standard, a seafarer shall be deemed to have been abandoned where, in violation of the requirements of this Convention or the terms of the seafarers’ employment agreement, the shipowner ( ).

In accordance with the MARPOL Convention as amended, every oil tank of 150 gross tonnage and above and every ship other than an oil tanker of 400 gross tonnage and above shall carry on board a ( ) approved by the Administration.

In accordance with the SOLAS Convention as amended, where the bilge pumps in periodically unattended machinery spaces are capable of being started automatically, means shall be provided to indicate when the pump is operating ( ) than would normally be expected.
